title: 104:  The Fan Spotlight Success Stories Episode
itunes:title: The Fan Spotlight Success Stories Episode
description: In this week’s episode, find out how Madison lost 100 pounds, how Erin takes advantage of her extra time in quarantine, and how Mark gets his motivation to continue to lose weight. Plus, listener Melanie shares how many miles she’s walking each day. (She’s catching up to Lisa!) So go ahead and push play -- be inspired! And when you’re done with the episode, head on over to our Foodcast page for some highlights.
itunes:summary: Get ready to be inspired as HG fans reveal their own tips for staying fit and healthy in quarantine!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
